The Present Status of Technology
At the present time in the United States, there are 255 educational radio
stations and 70 educational television stations on She air. There ere 350 - 400
closed-circuit television systems in various schools and colleges. There

and preparation. There are 5 state networks of educational television, one

plans or central state agencies for the development of educational television.
